backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining finance data models, authorization mixin, maps for user‑scoped records, and initial implementation of report creation with ID management.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report detailing implemented frontend features, affected files, components, and confidence metadata for reports‑related functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre‑generated summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React files and components throughout the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global base styles for the frontend UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including favicon, metadata, root div, and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, including full reports CRUD routes, and wrapping content in AppShell and theme providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper that loads the user profile, shows setup dialog when needed, and displays a spinner while loading.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login page using Internet Identity with styled card UI, loading state, and error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that collects and saves the user's name using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Catego: Computes expense totals by category and displays a color‑coded bar chart of spending distribution.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Invoic: Fetches invoices and shows counts for total, unpaid, overdue, and total paid value.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/QuickS: Calculates total income, expenses, and net value from transactions and displays them in summary cards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Report: Shows last and most-used report types and provides a button to create a new report.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TopCat: Determines the top five expense categories and displays totals and percentages for each.
Layout wrapper providing navigation, header, user menu, and routing integration for the app.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportRe: Runs financial report calculations for income vs expenses or category breakdown and renders result tables with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/tags/TagChips.ts: Displays a limited number of tag badges with a counter for additional hidden tags.
frontend/src/components/tags/TagMultiSel: Provides a popover-based multi-select UI for choosing tags and showing selected tags as removable badges.
frontend/src/components/tags/TagsManager: Tag management card enabling creation, listing, and deletion of tags with validation and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Bul: Dialog for bulk editing or deleting multiple transactions with options to change fields or modify tags.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Csv: Dialog for uploading, validating, and importing CSV transaction data with previews and error reporting.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Modal form for creating a new transaction with validation, tag selection, and API mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFinanceQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating finance data such as accounts, categories, transactions, budgets, and invoices.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading stored identities, and providing login/logout via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvoicePermissions: Fetches the caller's role and derives invoice-related permissions based on user role.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and base layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency and dates, using stored user settings when available.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/AccountDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single account’s details and balance, and lists or creates transactions for that account.
frontend/src/pages/AccountsPage.tsx: Shows all accounts with total balance and provides a dialog to create new accounts.
frontend/src/pages/BankConnectionsPage.t: Manages bank connections including creation, deletion, syncing, and viewing connection status.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetsPage.tsx: Handles monthly budgets, category limits, spending calculations, and budget creation or updates.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays categories with transaction totals over a date range and allows creating new categories.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard with date-range filtering that loads accounts, transactions, and categories and displays stats, charts, and onboarding UI when empty.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single invoice with permissions, actions for editing and PDF download, and fallback states for loading or missing invoices.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceFormPage.tsx: Create/edit form for invoices with line items, validation, totals calculation, and submission via create/update mutations.
frontend/src/pages/invoices/invoiceFilte: Defines invoice filter state and helpers for status labels, variants, and constructors.
Utility functions to compute invoice line totals, subtotal, tax, and overall totals.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicesPage.tsx: Invoice list with search, status filtering, permission‑based actions, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/ReportDetailPage.tsx: Displays a report’s details with download and delete options, handling loading and missing-report states.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFormPage.tsx: Form page for creating and editing reports with date validation, filters, tag selection, and PDF download.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Lists reports with filtering, deletion, PDF export, and navigation to view or edit.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings UI allowing users to store preferences like currency and manage tags.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Displays, filters, sorts, and manages transactions with bulk edit, CSV import/export, and tag support.
frontend/src/types/invoice.ts: Type definitions for invoices, items, statuses, and input payloads used across the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML invoice and triggers a file download, formatting customer, item, and total data.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML view for a report and triggers the browser print dialog to save as PDF.
frontend/src/utils/transactionsCsv.ts: Parses CSV text/files into transaction rows and validates them against accounts, categories, and tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, requirements, architecture notes, and existing implemented features.
